statements: SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, student_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM student_enrollment GROUP BY course_name ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id, course_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, course_name, student_id, student_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id = 100;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id, course_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_name = 'Alice' AND course_id = 101;
SELECT course_id, course_name, student_id, student_name FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY student_name DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM student
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM student
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_status FROM student WHERE enrollment_status = 'enrolled'
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM course
SELECT * FROM student WHERE enrollment_status = 'active';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM student WHERE student_id > 1000 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM student INNER JOIN course ON student.student_id = course.course_id;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM course WHERE instructor_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students, enrollment_status FROM student GROUP BY enrollment_status HAVING total_students > 50;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT course_name, course_instructor FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_courses;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_phone FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_instructor='John Doe';
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM student_courses WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students, courses WHERE students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT registration_date, registration_status FROM registrations WHERE registration_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, course_department FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT registration_id, registration_date, registration_status FROM registrations WHERE enrollment_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_desc FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT instructor_name, course_name FROM instructors i JOIN course_instructors ci ON i.instructor_id = ci.instructor_id JOIN courses c ON ci.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_enrollments FROM courses JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_enrollments DESC;

SELECT students.student_id, students.student_name, courses.course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_courses FROM instructors JOIN course_instructors ON instructors.instructor_id = course_instructors.instructor_id GROUP BY instructor_name ORDER BY total_courses DESC;
